name: Plastic Mobile
description:
As the most awarded mobile agency in Canada, Plastic Mobile offers clients end-to-end mobile services including mobile strategy, design, development and marketing - all inspired by user-centric experiences. Our areas of expertise include mobile app development, loyalty, mobile commerce - including mobile wallets, payments and coupons, as well as gamification and marketing.
Based out of Toronto and New York, we are a full-service mobile agency partnering with top-tier clients, such as Shoppers Drug Mart, Pizza Pizza, Rogers, REALTOR.ca, AIR MILES, and many more.
